articles.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Among sectors, buying is seen in the pharma, PSU Bank, FMCG and energy names, while selling is seen in the information technology and metal names. BSE midcap and smallcap indices are trading in the green.

articles.title: China's Huawei poised to overcome US ban with return of 5G phones -research firms - Reuters
articles.description: China's Huawei Technologies is plotting a return to the 5G smartphone industry by the end of this year, according to research firms, signalling a comeback after a U.S. ban on equipment sales decimated its consumer electronics business.
